product_name: The North Face Gilmore Triclimate 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: Stay dry, stay warm and adjust to the conditions with the versatile Gilmore Triclimate 3-in-1 insulated jacket by The North Face. It offers confident protection for your powder-seeking adventures. Three different ways to wear the system: wear shell jacket and zip-in liner jacket together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather warrants. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Zip chest media pocket; dual flap chest pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket. Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs with thumbholes help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; underarm vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Fully adjustable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit; hood can be secured to jacket when not in use, preventing it from flapping around and cramping your style. The North Face Gilmore Triclimate zip-in/out liner jacket uses Heatseeker(TM) synthetic insulation to keep you warm without inhibiting movement. Liner jacket has handwarmer pockets and rib-knit collar and cuffs. Easy zip-in system mates the liner jacket and shell jacket together for added warmth and allows easy reach-in access to the shell's interior features.
short_description: Stay dry, stay warm and adjust to the conditions with the versatile Gilmore Triclimate 3-in-1 insulated jacket by The North Face. It offers confident protection for your powder-seeking adventures.
